intro_only_event_multi_aprilfool_intro_2:
Welcome to our new hideout! Anyone want to join
our organization? We’re accepting new members!

The Pokémon Center is real comfy, y’know? All of
us in Team Break are, like, sooo happy!

We could even change our name to Team Happy
Break! Wouldn’t that be totally awesome?

We claim this Pokémon Center in the name of
Team Break! That’s that and there’ll be no buts
about it! Got it?

How am I supposed to just stay calm and shop
with all these Team Break members here?

Wait! They’re not gonna start showing up in the
sync pair scout or anything, are they?!
I didn’t scout any! I think that’s safe at least.
Still, it’s hard to stay calm about this...
Heyyy! Are you feeling super happy today, too?
I’m super DUPER happy, y’know? Like, toootally!
...Hey, did that sound natural to you just now?
Ugh. I’m really not used to talking like that.

I guess I can keep it up a little while longer,
though. We did just take over the Pokémon Center,
after all! It’s a celebration!
